name: d3-tube-map
description: Draw tube maps in the style of the London Underground

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -g d3:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-tube-map.js --extend -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-tube-map.js -c -m -o build/d3-tube-map.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-tube-map.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-tube-map.js build/d3-tube-map.min.js
